metadata.name: Metta - Loving Kindness
metadata.description:
The first offering in the Daily Dose collection. This collection will represent a place for new ideas from ModernVintagePhotos. 

All images used in the digital art were taken by and the property of ModernVintagePhotos.

License - Both prints and NFT can be displayed privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with artist.
